Package edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints

Contains classes used for displaying a master list of Students, for adding, accessing, and editing each student's profile, and for updating each student's sticker count.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClasslistFragment.OnStudentSelectedListener
    Interface definition for the callback to be invoked when a Student in the class list is selected.
    EditClasslistFragment.OnEditStudentSelectedListener
    Interface definition for the callback to be invoked when a Student in the edit class list is selected.
    EditStudentFragment.OnEditStudentButtonClickedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a Student is selected in the list view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitmapListFragment
    A ListFragment that supports loading images displayed in each row of the ListView in a background thread rather than on the UI thread.
    ClasslistFragment
    A ListFragment that displays the current list of students in the PocketPoints app.
    EditClasslistFragment
    A ListFragment that displays a list of students available for editing.
    EditStudentFragment
    A Fragment that is displayed whenever the user wants to add a new student or edit a current student.
    ImageUtils
    Uninstantiable class with static methods for decoding a scaled image.
    MainActivity
    The PocketPoints app's sole Activity.
    StickerChartFragment
    A Fragment that displays a graphical representation of the number of stickers currently associated with the selected student.
    Student
    Model class representing a single student.
    StudentManager
    Class that manages all interactions with the students database in the PocketPoints app.
    StudentSQLiteOpenHelper
    Creates and upgrades a database for storing student data.
    StudentSQLiteOpenHelper.StudentCursor
    A convenience class that wraps a cursor that returns rows from the students table.

Package edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints Description

Contains classes used for displaying a master list of Students, for adding, accessing, and editing each student's profile, and for updating each student's sticker count.
